title: Ticket #3888: Have birdwatcher replace kbdd on Windows
description:
condor_kbdd is massive overkill for what should be the simple task of checking for keyboard and mouse activity on Windows. Because of its somewhat specialized needs on Windows combined with being a daemon core process, it has had a tendency to get broken without anyone really noticing until long after the fact, not to mention the amount of hacking that has had to be done to the dprintf system to work around kbdd being run under a user's account.

Since we already have birdwatcher on Windows, it would make sense to just drop responsibility for monitoring into birdwatcher instead.
remarks: Punting to TJ for code review.
